title: # 341 - Liza Treyger & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Liza Treyger to talk about twitter fights, sex, porn, gang bangs, feminism, and much more!

This episode is brought to you by Pro Flowers. Get a dozen assorted roses for $19 by going to www.proflowers.com, click the microphone, and enter the promo code "Bertcast"

This episode is also brought to you by Brumate. Brumate is the fastest growing drinkware brand in the world. Get 15% off of your first order by going to www.brumate.com and using my code “Bertcast”

This episode is also brought to you by Free Fly. Get 20% off when you visit www.freeflyapparel.com and use promo code “Bertcast”

This episode is also brought to you by Blue Apron. Get $60 off today at www.blueapron.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Manscaped. Get 20% off, free shipping, and a free travel bag by using the offer code “Bert” at www.manscaped.com 

The Body Shots Fall Tour is on pre sale now! Use the promo code “Shots” to get tickets at www.bertbertbert.com

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
